name: FFVII RPG GAME
description: A small interactive game based on Final Fantasy 7. Users will use attacks, magic, heals to survive the battle

name: YouTube Clone
description: A youtube clone where users are able to watch videos. They can also leave comments on videos as well.

name: Studio Movie Ghibli
description: A movie app based off Studio Movie Ghibli Films. Users are able to sign up/login and leave reviews on their films.They are also able to customize their profile.

name: Facenovel
description: A simple application based off Facebook. Users are able to register/login make edits to their own page. They can also post comments and make blogs.
